DATED SERIES "A" CHICAGO ROUND TABLE
Tapes for the Round Table are recorded in Chicago
by NBC and a copy is sent to the first station on each leg on
Monday following Sunday’s broadcast,. Upon completion of the
circuit, the tapes are returned to the Radio Office, University
